channel.title: fenn, larry
channel.description: some of my research, thoughts, and projects.

item.title: Mathematica Projects
item.description: This is the archive listing of all the old Mathematica projects hosted on the old website.

item.title: Mixed Procedures For Stochastic Optimization
item.description: This is a significant generalization of my earlier stochastic optimization efforts. I presented as an author at the INFORMS annual conference in Philadelphia.

item.title: Decision Trees For Survey Construction
item.description:
This is a companion piece to a piece of research currently being done by Christina Zamfirescu of Hunter College about automated survey construction.

The article covers a few examples and transformations in parallel with her work which uses a different method. As cited in the Electronic Journal of Statistics: Electron. J. Statist. 9 (2015), no. 2, 2202â€“2254. doi:10.1214/15-EJS1067.

PDF

item.title: Stochastic Optimization
item.description: Research done through Felisa Vazquez-Abad at Hunter College on stochastic optimization algorithms to solve a particular transit problem.
